translations.translation: He looked down and saw (his friend) in the midst of Hell.
Then he will look downwards, and will see him in the depths of Hell.
He will look down and see him in hell.
He therefore looked down and saw him amidst the blazing fire.
So he looked down and saw him in the midst of the Fire.
Then he looked down and saw him in the midst of hell.
Then he looks, and sees him in the midst of Hell.
Then looketh he and seeth him in the depth of hell.
Then he will look and see him in the midst of the Fire.
Then he will look down and see him in the midst of the Flaming Fire.
Then he will take a look and sight him in the middle of hell.
He looked down and saw him in the midst of the Fire.
So he looked down and saw him in the midst of the Fire.
Then, he will look and see him in the midst of Hell.
He will look, and will see him in the pit of Hell.
And he will look and see him in the midst of the Hellfire.

[37:55] Then he, that speaker, will take a look, through one of the apertures in Paradise, and he will catch sight of him, that is, he will see his comrade, in the centre of Hell, in the middle of the Fire.
(Then looketh he and seeth him) and sees his disbelieving brother (in the depth of hell) in the middle of hell.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { فِي سَوَآءِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ } معناه وسطُ الجَحيمِ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { فَٱطَّلَعَ } بعد نظر من الكوى المفتوحة في الجنة نحو النار { فَرَآهُ } أي: قرينه المنكر { فِي سَوَآءِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ } [الصافات: 55] أي: وسطه معذباً بأنواع العذاب

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { فاطَّلَع } على أهل النار { فرآه } أي: قرينه { في سواءِ الجحيم } في وسطها
